person.persName: John A. Goodson (Covington, Kentucky, retired farmer)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, retired farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Esther Goodson. Father of Jane Goodson, William Goodson, Lizzie Goodson, Lorer Goodson, and John Goodson. Carpenter in Kenton County in 1850. Retired farmer in Covington in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Covington in 1860.
